entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT, North Bay
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 11:11 a.m. EDT Saturday 29 April 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Rain, 8.0Â°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: North Bay Airport 1:00 PM EDT Saturday 29 April 2023
Condition: Light Rain
Temperature: 8.0°C
Pressure / Tendency: 100.7 kPa falling
Visibility: 11 km
Humidity: 95 %
Dewpoint: 7.3°C
Wind: ESE 23 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: 2
